Title: If All the World's a Stage, Identity Is Nothing But a Costume
Writer: Lilly Wachowski (created by), Lana Wachowski (created by), J. Michael Straczynski (created by), Lana Wachowski, J. Michael Straczynski
Actors: Doona Bae, Jamie Clayton, Tina Desai, Tuppence Middleton
Plot: Sun moves ahead with her undercover mission, while Lito heads to Hollywood for the audition of a lifetime. Capheus prepares for his first big speech.
